result.execSummary:
Marlin M. Freeman was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Marlin M. Freeman was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Extradition-Arrest without Warrant (Sharon, Mercer Co, PA)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marlin M. Freeman

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Attorney Joshua H. Klaff in court.  Mark M. Jahnke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant extradited.

Defendant Marlin M. Freeman in court in custody with attorney Joshua H. Klaff.  Mark M. Jahnke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant sworn; waives extradition freely and voluntarily.  Waiver signed in open Court.  Further proceedings scheduled for December 23, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Marlin M. Freeman in court in custody with attorney Joshua H. Klaff.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Extradition hearing scheduled for December 4, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Marlin M. Freeman in court in custody with attorney Joshua H. Klaff.  Richard Jay Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for December 1, 2015, at 3:00 pm.
